Adele has wowed her fans with a new super-slim look when she attended rapper Drake's 33rd birthday bash.

The A-list filled party saw the 31-year-old singer looking transformed since splitting from her husband Simon Konecki in April, after eight years of marriage.

It has now been reported that the secret behind her three-stone weight loss has been a devotion to The Body Coach Joe Wicks.

The Sun has reported that Adele has been secretly following the high intensity videos and workouts that have been championed by Wicks.

There has also been a nod to celebrity personal trainer Dalton Wong, who has helped the likes of Jennifer Lawrence, who is a close friend of the chart-topping singer.

(Image: mirror.co.uk)

A source told The Sun: “Adele’s been secretly working with these personal trainers.

“She’s not the sort to exercise in front of others, so she follows regimes and plans at home, using their videos and tutorials.

“The progress she has made in the last six months is clear for all to see.”

(Image: PA)

(Image: WireImage)

Joe, 33, has recently moved to Los Angeles, where Adele is based, along with his daughter and wife Rosie Jones, who is a former glamour model.

Adele has bonded with 33-year-old rapper Drake in recent times, with a source saying "single parent life and talk about raising a child in the spotlight," being an area of common ground.

(Image: GC Images)

Drake's birthday bash saw P Diddy and Chris Brown on the guest list as well as Keeping Up With The Kardashians star Kylie Jenner , who has caused a stir by flirting with the rapper throughout the night.
